name: jsts
description: A JavaScript library of spatial predicates and functions for processing geometry
author: Bj√∂rn Harrtell <bjorn@wololo.org>

scripts.test: NODE_PATH=src nyc mocha --timeout 10s --compilers js:babel-register --recursive test/auto/node test/manual
scripts.build: rollup -c rollup.config.js -o dist/jsts.js && uglifyjs dist/jsts.js --in-source-map dist/jsts.js.map --source-map dist/jsts.min.js.map --source-map-url jsts.min.js.map --comments -c -m -o dist/jsts.min.js
scripts.build-tests: NODE_PATH=src browserify test/auto/browser/runner.js -o dist/tests.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
